short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your sales revenue and streamline your sales process. Automate CRM field updates, meeting notes and tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your sales revenue and streamline your sales process with Sowl - the ultimate productivity tool for Account Executives. 

Stop wasting time on updating CRM!
As important the CRM is, it is now used as a database of customers and leads with all kinds of fields and details. For Account Executives having to use this on a daily basis along with their busy schedule can be complex, tedious and frustrating!

Say Hello to efficient, effective sales processes aimed to provide consistency.
Stay on track of all your deals/accounts and makes sure your Sales Manager never complains about your CRM hygiene again.

Built by Account Executives for Account Executives.

Sowl is a powerful productivity tool that integrates seamlessly with Hubspot CRM, helping Account Executives stay on top of their busy schedules and day-to-day activities. Here are some of the standout features that make Sowl the perfect tool for managing your sales activites:

Meeting Notes and Deals: With Sowl, you can quickly add meeting notes for client calls and sync them with your contacts or deals in Hubspot CRM, ensuring you never miss a beat. This feature helps you stay organized and on top of your deals, so you can close more sales.

Sales Templates and Workflows: Sowl lets you create customized sales templates and automated workflows for different sales processes, including Discovery Calls, MEDDIC, SPIN, Demo Calls, and more. This feature helps you stay consistent and save time, so you can focus on closing deals and growing your business relations.

Access and Update CRM: Sowl lets you access and update your Hubspot CRM anytime, anywhere, making it faster, easier, and more effective than ever before. No more struggling with slow pages and endless fields.

Ready to supercharge your sales processes and boost your revenue? 
Download Sowl today and start streamlining your workflows and managing your deals like a pro. 

With Sowl, you'll have everything you need to stay organized, focused, and on track - so why wait? 
Get started today and see the results for yourself!
